actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill authorizing further appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts.

summary.text: Revises the John F. Kennedy Center Act to authorize to be appropriated such additional sums to the Secretary of the Interior as may be necessary for the administrative services to the nonperforming arts functions of the John. F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts.

titles.title: A bill authorizing further appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts.
